arts.ttl: Report: Man United could be offered a £64m package for 25-year-old attacker
arts.sum: Manchester United attacker Antony has been linked with a permanent exit from the club at the end of the season, and Atletico Madrid would be willing to provide him with an exit route. The 25-year-old is currently on loan at Real Betis, and he has done quite well for the Spanish outfit. arts.ttl: Ratings: Atlético return to winning ways as Alvarez, Pablo Barrios spark late rally
arts.sum: Made a vital intervention to prevent an Ejuke cross from getting behind Jan Oblak, and he later cleared the ball off the line after Oblak’s first-half save on Akor Adams. Swapped to right-back later in the second half, connecting with Conor Gallagher and RodrigoRiquelme in the offense.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone evaluates Atlético Madrid’s title hopes after victory over Sevilla
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the media following his team’s dramatic late win over Sevilla in La Liga, with Pablo Barrios securing a winner deep into injury time after Julián Álvarez had cancelled out Lucien Agoume’s early strike for the home team. The team was calm with 1-0, we worked through the game, we got better with time.

arts.ttl: European football: Pablo Barrios strikes late as Atlético keep leaders honest
arts.sum: Win over Sevilla closes gap to Real Madrid and Barcelona Gladbach’s teenage goalkeeper’s clean sheet streak ends Pablo Barrios scored deep in added time to give Atlético Madrid a much-needed 2-1 La Liga win at Sevilla on Sunday that ended their month-long six-game winless run in all competitions. Eliminated from the Champions League in the round of 16 on penalties by old rivals Real Madrid and knocked out of the Copa del Rey in the semi-finals by Barcelona, Atlético kept their slim hopes of claiming the league title alive after the leaders, Barça, and Real both dropped points on Saturday.
